item.title: Link Shorter First Project in Dotnet Core
item.description: This took too long time, but here it is A while back, I’ve started learning .NET Core (and it’s still in progress). But as a result and in some way training I made an web app… to make your links shorter! Here you can check the repo with code and additional info. What next? Maybe another .NET Core project? I wanted to do this but there are also other skills I need to develop and they just can’t wait ðŸ˜… Also in this semester I have to write my thesis and pass 5 other exams soo a lot of work to do and not too much time.

item.title: New project coming to town - about ASP.NET Core
item.description: December is a great time to… start learning new things. You know - the atmosphere of New Year’s resolution and bringing somethink new to… your projects and skills. ASP.NET 3.5 Web Forms - what a … At the universtity this year I’ve started classes “Web application programming”. I thought it would be… wait for it… breathtakingm but it is not. We are learning a little old. We are learning outdated technology which for me - it’s a little bit puzzling.
